attributes.action: Help Fran Lyon keep her baby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fran Lyon is having her baby taken off her as soon as she is born by Hexham social services all because when she was a teenager she was abused and suffered from depression and self harm, she is now 22 and has been given the all clear by her doctors but social services have deemed her unfit and a danger to her child, we cannot let this happen to her, its inhumane

Type her name Fran Lyon into google to get a full account of her story, its heartbreaking and she needs your help, please sign this petition

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
